ready_adventure: Ready for your next adventure? Book your flight today!
experience_helicopter: Experience premium aerial travel. Book your helicopter today!
support_message: Whether you're booking a flight or chartering a helicopter, we're here to help. Search our FAQs or contact our support team.
premium_air_travel: Premium air travel for your business, leisure and charter needs.
subscribe_description: Get travel deals and updates straight to your inbox.
travel_info_subtitle: Everything you need to know before your flight
baggage_policy_content: Passengers are allowed one carry-on and one personal item. Checked baggage must not exceed 23kg. Oversize or overweight bags may incur additional fees.
checkin_guidelines_content: Online check-in opens 24 hours before departure. Arrive 2 hours early for domestic and 3 hours for international flights.
travel_restrictions_content: Entry requirements vary. Check destination visa and documentation requirements in advance.
id_and_docs_content: A government-issued photo ID is required. For international travel, a valid passport and any necessary visas are mandatory.
weather_and_delays_content: You will be notified via SMS or email if your flight is delayed due to weather or operational issues.
security_procedures_content: Remove laptops, liquids, and metal items at the security checkpoint. Limit liquids to 100ml per container.
children_and_minors_content: Unaccompanied minors require prior arrangement. Please contact support for details.
special_assistance_content: If you need wheelchair access or other special assistance, please notify us at least 48 hours before your flight.
need_help_content: Our support team is here for you 24/7
customer_support_content: Need assistance? Weâ€™re here to help. Choose from the options below or contact us directly.
faq_description: Find quick answers to common questions.
live_chat_description: Chat with our support team in real-time.
contact_us_directly_text: Send us a message and our team will get back to you shortly.
faq_header_subtitle: Find answers to common questions about flights and helicopter charters.
faq_browse_description: Browse common questions about flight bookings and helicopter charters.
faq_q_book_flight: How do I book a flight?
faq_a_book_flight: You can book flights directly through our website.
faq_q_charter_helicopter: How do I charter a helicopter?
faq_a_charter_helicopter: Use our helicopter booking tool or contact our charter specialists.
faq_q_cancel_flight: Can I cancel or reschedule my flight?
faq_a_cancel_flight: Manage your bookings in your dashboard. Fees may apply.
faq_q_baggage_helicopter: What is the baggage allowance for helicopter charters?
faq_a_baggage_helicopter: Helicopters have strict limits. Contact support for details.
faq_q_contact_support: How do I contact customer support?
faq_a_contact_support: Via the Contact page, live chat, or call our 24/7 helpline.
faq_q_refunds: Are refunds available on canceled flights?
faq_a_refunds: Refunds depend on fare type. Non-refundable fares may offer credits.
faq_q_pets_helicopter: Are pets allowed on helicopter charters?
faq_a_pets_helicopter: Some charters allow pets. Please notify us during booking.
faq_q_seat_selection: Can I choose my seat during flight booking?
faq_a_seat_selection: Yes, seat selection is available at checkout and in your account.
faq_q_need_account: Do I need an account to book a flight or helicopter?
faq_a_need_account: You can book as a guest, but an account helps manage bookings.
faq_q_documents_international: What documents do I need for international flights?
faq_a_documents_international: You need a valid passport and visa if applicable.
